DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect progressive , incremental hypoxia multiple wavelength light .
DOC.criteria: Is 18 35 year age Is American Society Anesthesiologist status 1 Has BMI 18 30 Currently take medication birth control pills Has participate investigational drug study within one month prior start study Fails Allen 's Test confirm patency colateral artery Subject female positive pregnancy test , female unwilling use effective birth control time screen study termination Has positive urine continine drug test Has report allergy Lidocaine Has anemia hemoglobinopathy Has room air saturation le 95 % pulse oximetry Has abnormal EKG Has abnormal pulmonary function test via spirometry Is intolerant breathe mask apparatus Has COHb great 3 % , MetHb great 2 % Has another condition , opinion principle investigator would suitable participation study Is unwilling unable provide inform consent comply study procedure
